title: Speed-Mart E-Commerce App
description: A fast and user-friendly shopping application that allows users to browse products, add items to their cart, add items to wishlist, and place orders seamlessly. It offers an intuitive interface, quick navigation, and a smooth checkout experience for hassle-free online shopping(Frontend based).

title: Netflix Clone Website
description: This project is a front-end replica of Netflix created using only HTML and CSS. It recreates the homepage layout, sections, and visual design of the original platform. The site is fully responsive, ensuring a smooth viewing experience across desktops, tablets, and mobile devices.

title: Employee Salary Prediction
description: This is a Machine learning project that predicts employee salary using regression models and a Streamlit demo.It is feeded by an dataset based on that it predicts salary as per given data.

title: Weather App
description: A simple Weather Application built with HTML, CSS, and python script using flask module that uses the OpenWeatherMap API to fetch and display live weather updates üåç

title: College Predictor Tool
description: A web app that predicts engineering colleges and branches based on your exam rank and branch preference. Supports JEE Main, JEE Advanced, and WBJEE with category-priority predictions (ST ‚Üí SC ‚Üí OBC ‚Üí General). Built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript using a JSON-based dataset.
